parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the DPS unit can cause sudden and unexpected loss of power steering, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: the vehicle veers or drifts suddenly
the steering becomes stiff or hard to turn
the vehicle requires excessive force to correct steering
the steering jerks or pulls to one side
the engine light comes on with a "DP5" error message.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical System Failure - Running and Brake Lights
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the loss of running and brake lights, reducing the vehicle's visibility and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The fuse for the running lights and brake lights blows when putting the vehicle in reverse
resulting in the loss of running and brake lights
increased risk of accidents due to reduced visibility.
